title: Lida93
author: Lida93
content: Today, life have taken a different phase in a way that humanity didn't imagine. A present day life where every man automatically turned a  security to himself in all spheres.With no loophole for vulnerability, not even to a closest mate or friend even for some seconds.Â In other words, ones vulnerability turns rather to an opportunity for another. No man, hardly any man wants to guide or brace up another that's in some way or the other vulnerable especially for something of high value these days.And this has made many feel betrayed.No wonder a certain man said; "the saddest thing about betrayal is that, it never, ever, comes from your enemies.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: While it's indeed a world where too many want to sell you something, scam you or find a way to profit, generalizing makes you be wrong.There are also plenty of people eager to help out, especially if one is vulnerable or in trouble.But all this is the human nature. Nothing has change in the last 1000s of years; it's just that* advertising and scammers can reach you faster* human contact is diminished (usually by choice!) and vulnerable people usually need somebody in person to "be there"* media will spam you with all the wrongdoing in the world because shocking sells, and they have advertising to sellBut again, nothing new really.One needs friends. Good friends. As many as possible. Then, if one betrays you in a way or another, there will be the others to help out.However, this kind of discussion is too general and not Bitcoin related; you may want to move it to Off topic, or Politics, I don't know... (see bottom-left link)
